verses.verse: Now the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> the first-born of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> (for he was the first-born, but because he <S%H2490>defiled<s%> his father's <S%H3326>bed,<s%> his <S%H1062>birthright<s%> was <S%H5414>given<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> so that he is not <S%H3187>enrolled<s%> in the <S%H3187>genealogy<s%> according to the <S%H1062>birthright.<s%>

<S%H3588>Though<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H1396>prevailed<s%> over his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and from him [came] the <S%H5057>leader,<s%> yet the <S%H1062>birthright<s%> belonged to <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>),
the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> the first-born of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> [were] <S%H2585>Hanoch<s%> and <S%H6396>Pallu,<s%> <S%H2696>Hezron<s%> and <S%H3756>Carmi.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3100>Joel<s%> [were] <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H1463>Gog<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H8096>Shimei<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%>
<S%H4318>Micah<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H7211>Reaiah<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H9058>Baal<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%>

<S%H880>Beerah<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> Tilgath-pilneser <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> <S%H1540>carried<s%> <S%H1540>away<s%> into <S%H1540>exile;<s%> he was <S%H5387>leader<s%> of the <S%H7206>Reubenites.<s%>

And his <S%H251>kinsmen<s%> by their <S%H4940>families,<s%> in the <S%H3187>genealogy<s%> of their <S%H8435>generations,<s%> [were] <S%H3262>Jeiel<s%> the <S%H7218>chief,<s%> then <S%H2148>Zechariah<s%>

and <S%H1106>Bela<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5811>Azaz,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8087>Shema,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3100>Joel,<s%> <S%H1931>who<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> in <S%H6177>Aroer,<s%> even to <S%H5015>Nebo<s%> and Baal-meon.

And to the <S%H4217>east<s%> he <S%H3427>settled<s%> as <S%H5704>far<s%> as the <S%H935>entrance<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> from the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H6578>Euphrates,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> their <S%H4735>cattle<s%> had <S%H7235>increased<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead.<s%>

And in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> they <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H4421>war<s%> with the <S%H1905>Hagrites,<s%> who <S%H5307>fell<s%> by their <S%H3027>hand,<s%> so that they <S%H3427>occupied<s%> their <S%H168>tents<s%> <S%H5921>throughout<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6440>land<s%> <S%H4217>east<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead.<s%>
Now the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> <S%H5048>opposite<s%> them in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan<s%> as <S%H5704>far<s%> as <S%H5548>Salecah.<s%>
<S%H3100>Joel<s%> [was] the <S%H7218>chief,<s%> and <S%H8223>Shapham<s%> the <S%H4932>second,<s%> then <S%H3285>Janai<s%> and <S%H8202>Shaphat<s%> in <S%H1316>Bashan.<s%>

And their <S%H251>kinsmen<s%> of their fathers' <S%H1004>households<s%> [were] <S%H4317>Michael,<s%> <S%H4918>Meshullam,<s%> <S%H7652>Sheba,<s%> <S%H3140>Jorai,<s%> <S%H3275>Jacan,<s%> <S%H2127>Zia,<s%> and <S%H5677>Eber,<s%> <S%H7651>seven.<s%>

<S%H428>These<s%> [were] the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H32>Abihail,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2359>Huri,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3386>Jaroah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4317>Michael,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3454>Jeshishai,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3163>Jahdo,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H938>Buz;<s%>
<S%H277>Ahi<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5661>Abdiel,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1476>Guni,<s%> [was] <S%H7218>head<s%> of their fathers' <S%H1004>households.<s%>

And they <S%H3427>lived<s%> in <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> in <S%H1316>Bashan<s%> and in its <S%H1323>towns,<s%> and in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands<s%> of <S%H8289>Sharon,<s%> as <S%H5921>far<s%> as their <S%H8444>borders.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> of these were <S%H3187>enrolled<s%> in the <S%H3187>genealogies<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3147>Jotham<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> and the <S%H1425>Gadites<s%> and the half-tribe of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> [consisting] of <S%H2428>valiant<s%> <S%H1121>men,<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> who <S%H5375>bore<s%> <S%H4043>shield<s%> and <S%H2719>sword<s%> and <S%H1869>shot<s%> with <S%H7198>bow,<s%> and [were] <S%H3925>skillful<s%> in <S%H4421>battle,<s%> [were] 44760, who <S%H3318>went<s%> to <S%H6635>war.<s%>
And they <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H4421>war<s%> <S%H5973>against<s%> the <S%H1905>Hagrites,<s%> <S%H3195>Jetur,<s%> <S%H5305>Naphish,<s%> and <S%H5114>Nodab.<s%>

And they were <S%H5826>helped<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> them, and the <S%H1905>Hagrites<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> who [were] with them were <S%H5414>given<s%> into their <S%H3027>hand;<s%> for they <S%H2199>cried<s%> out to <S%H430>God<s%> in the <S%H4421>battle,<s%> and He was <S%H6279>entreated<s%> for them, <S%H3588>because<s%> they <S%H982>trusted<s%> in Him.

And they <S%H7617>took<s%> <S%H7617>away<s%> their <S%H4735>cattle:<s%> their 50000 <S%H1581>camels,<s%> 250000 <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> 2000 <S%H2543>donkeys,<s%> and 100000 <S%H5315>men.<s%> <S%H120><s%>

For <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H2491>slain,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H4421>war<s%> [was] of <S%H430>God.<s%> And they <S%H3427>settled<s%> in their <S%H8478>place<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H1473>exile.<s%>

Now the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the half-tribe of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> in the <S%H776>land;<s%> from <S%H1316>Bashan<s%> to <S%H2768>Baal-hermon<s%> and <S%H8149>Senir<s%> and <S%H2022>Mount<s%> Hermon they were <S%H7235>numerous.<s%>

And <S%H428>these<s%> were the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of their fathers' <S%H1004>households,<s%> even <S%H6081>Epher,<s%> <S%H3469>Ishi,<s%> <S%H447>Eliel,<s%> <S%H5837>Azriel,<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> <S%H1938>Hodaviah,<s%> and <S%H3164>Jahdiel,<s%> <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H2428>valor,<s%> <S%H8034>famous<s%> <S%H376>men,<s%> <S%H7218>heads<s%> of their fathers' <S%H1004>households.<s%>

But they <S%H4603>acted<s%> <S%H4603>treacherously<s%> against the <S%H430>God<s%> of their fathers, and <S%H1>played<s%> the <S%H2181>harlot<s%> <S%H2181>after<s%> the <S%H310>gods<s%> of the <S%H430>peoples<s%> of the <S%H5971>land,<s%> <S%H776>whom<s%> <S%H834>God<s%> had <S%H430>destroyed<s%> <S%H8045>before<s%> <S%H4480><s%> them.

So the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5782>stirred<s%> up the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H6322>Pul,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria,<s%> even the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of Tilgath-pilneser <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria,<s%> and he <S%H1540>carried<s%> them <S%H1540>away<s%> into <S%H1540>exile,<s%> namely the <S%H7206>Reubenites,<s%> the <S%H1425>Gadites,<s%> and the half-tribe of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> them to <S%H2477>Halah,<s%> <S%H2249>Habor,<s%> <S%H2024>Hara,<s%> and to the <S%H5104>river<s%> of <S%H1470>Gozan,<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>
